page.title: 10MEMORIAL HALL USAGE.
page.content: As the Memorial Hall is really the village community centre it is very well used. The Bowling and Tennis clubs are based there whilst the billiard room is also used for darts and dominoes. Small rooms are used for the doctor's surgery and any village committee meetings such as the Women's Institute, Hospital Comforts Fund or Gymkhana Comittees. Typically the Hall is used by the W.I. one Monday evening a month; Playgroup each Tuesday and Thursday morning; Darby & Joan's each Tuesday afternoon; Badminton Tuesday evening; Indoor Tennis Wednesday evenings in winter; Mothers & Toddlers group each Thursday afternoon (clinic also held fortnightly); Folk Dancing Thursday evenings; Bingo Friday evenings; Wedding receptions, socials, dances on Saturdays; Karate Sunday mornings.
